name: The Stormcloaks
startIntroPart1: We're fighting because we're done bleeding for an Empire that won't bleed for us. We're fighting because our own Jarls, once strong, wise men, have become fearful and blind ,We're fighting because Skyrim needs heroes, and there's no one else but us.!
startIntroPart2: A new day is dawning and the sun rises over Skyrim
declaringWar: We fight for the freedom of our lands
attacked: We will avenge the blood of our brothers and sisters!
defeated: It appears Skyrim must stand alone. Again.
introduction: The sons and daughters of Skyrim greet you
hateNo: A crown doesn't make a king!
Who do you think we are?
afterPeace: The sons of Skyrim will live up to their agreements. As long as you hold to your's.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: [+20]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>

name: The Empire
startIntroPart1: Emperor Titus Mede II ascendent to the throne. The Empire id at thid time a shadow of its former glory. Valenwood and Elsweyr have been ceded to the third Aldmeri Dominion, and Black Marsh has been lost to Imperial rule since the Oblivion Crisis.Morrowind had yet to fully recover from the eruption of Red Mountain. you must reunite The Empire
declaringWar: We fight for the freedom of our lands
attacked: We will avenge the blood of our brothers and sisters!
defeated: It appears Skyrim must stand alone. Again.
introduction: The sons and daughters of Skyrim greet you
hateNo: A crown doesn't make a king!
Who do you think we are?
afterPeace: The sons of Skyrim will live up to their agreements. As long as you hold to your's.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for [15] turns.
[-10]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in all cities]
